Teaching

Courses and teaching activities by Fabio Giglietto at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo.

Current Courses

Office Hours

Monday 14:00-16:00, Room 3.12 Wednesday 10:00-12:00, Room 3.12 Or by appointment (email: fabio.giglietto@uniurb.it)

Tutorials & Resources

  • Introduction to R for Communication Research

    A beginner's guide to R programming for communication and media research

  • Social Media Data Analysis with Python

    Tutorial series on collecting and analyzing social media data with Python

Research Supervision

I am available to supervise Bachelor’s and Master’s theses in the following areas:

  • Digital Media Analysis
  • Social Media Research
  • Computational Social Science
  • Media Studies
  • Online Misinformation and Disinformation

If you are interested in working with me, please email me with a brief outline of your research interests.
